name: Soulstream Expansive Random Bitz: Broom Service
name_original: Soulstream Expansive Random Bitz: Broom Service
description:
Presenting the Soulstream Expansive Random Bit : Broom Service!

Have fun in the skies with one of the baddies from the SOULSTREAM EXPANSIVE! 

It's a nice night, but EXPANSION is in the air, seems this time of year Serene holds close to her heart, but a little side effect causes her to absorb all types of love! 

Including Motherly instincts! 

Press E to grip that big ol' lady! 

Hold on for more then 5 seconds at a time and well... Be careful... 

This is a download available for everyone! But if you guys would like more! feel free to join the patreon! It's my little gift to you guys, Smol' but sweet! Happy Halloween and enjoy!

Luca from the SoulStream is creating The SoulStream Expansive ( Inflation Games) | Patreon
